name: Officer Perosei
Lore: 'Royal Naboo security guard who can disassemble and reassemble a Naboo blaster in less than sixty seconds. During the occupation, was a prisoner at Camp Four.',
Text: 'Once during your deploy phase, may use 1 Force to relocate Perosei to an adjacent Naboo site. While with a Republic character during battle, may place Perosei out of play to add 5 to your total power this battle.',
